snippet: The death toll, now at 194, is likely to grow following the disaster near an Italian island in the Mediterranean.
abstract: Divers searching underwater wreckage of migrant ship that capsized near Italian island Lampedusa in Mediterranean Sea recover another 83 bodies, raising death toll to 194.
lead_paragraph: The death toll, now at 194, is likely to grow following the disaster near an Italian island in the Mediterranean.

headline.main: Divers Recover 83 More Bodies From Migrant Ship
headline.print_headline: Divers Recover 83 More Bodies From Migrant Ship
